title: Log Production Output
description: An operator at the end of a shift needs to log the quantity of good parts produced for a specific work order.

tasks.description: Select the work order that was being processed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the active work order for their station.

tasks.description: Enter the total quantity of 'good' units produced during the shift.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the correct count of completed parts.

tasks.description: Confirm the transaction and verify that the work order's completed quantity has been updated.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the system has accepted the entry and the work order shows the new total.
